projects.title: Multimodal Database Management System
projects.excerpt: A comprehensive database system engineered from scratch, implementing five distinct indexing structures (including Sequential File and Extended Hashing). Features both a Command Line Interface (CLI) and a Graphical User Interface (GUI) for query execution and data export to JSON/CSV formats.

projects.title: Procedural Feline Locomotion in Godot
projects.excerpt: A procedural animation project developed within the Godot Engine, simulating realistic feline kinematics and naturalistic behaviors through programmatic implementation rather than pre-baked assets.

projects.title: Particle Life Simulation
projects.excerpt: An artificial life simulation modeling emergent complex systems through particle interaction. Implements attraction/repulsion laws within a matrix to demonstrate self-organizing behaviors.

projects.title: P&R Architects - Corporate Web Portal
projects.excerpt: A professional corporate web portal designed for an architectural firm with two decades of industry presence. Features include a dynamic carousel, modal-based project management, a thematic styling system, and seamless WhatsApp integration.

projects.title: Rinder - AI-Driven Matchmaking Platform
projects.excerpt: An innovative dating platform utilizing neural networks for intelligent user matchmaking. Architected as a Flask monolith, featuring experimental frontend implementations in Vue.js and a demonstration interface built with React/Next.js.

projects.title: CulqiPay - Zero-Cost Payment Gateway Implementation
projects.excerpt: A fully functional e-commerce platform engineered using exclusively open-source and free-tier tools. Implements secure authentication, product catalog management, and payment processing via the Culqi API, deployed via GitHub Pages.

projects.title: Graph Organizer - Hierarchical Graph Editor
projects.excerpt: An interactive web application for constructing nested hierarchical graphs. Enables nodes to encapsulate internal subgraphs, facilitating the organization of complex workflows, curriculum dependencies, or software architecture.

projects.title: AI-Powered Report Generator
projects.excerpt: A comprehensive system for automated report generation utilizing Artificial Intelligence. Features a Python/Flask backend for image processing and document synthesis, paired with a modern frontend interface.

projects.title: 3D Planetary Visualizer
projects.excerpt: A web-based 3D visualization tool rendering planetary bodies utilizing NASA API data. Features a full-stack architecture designed for the real-time rendering and visualization of astronomical datasets.

projects.title: Bipedal Physics Simulator
projects.excerpt: An advanced physics simulation focusing on bipedal locomotion using procedural animation techniques. Implements rigid body physics and biomechanical constraints using the Pygame library.

projects.title: Music Similarity Search Engine
projects.excerpt: Implementation of high-dimensional similarity search algorithms applied to Spotify datasets. Includes visualization of performance metrics and a query engine for identifying stylistically similar musical compositions.
